name: Rock-On
overview: You are a buster and you are on a journey to find fortune and the legendary FISA ("mysterious fortune hidden by the ancient people" as the introduction sequence says). Furthermore, the whole world is watching you on TV and looking for your success. Your space ships starts will really low resources, single laser and slow speed. Destroyed enemies will drop icons : 2 (2 ways), 3 (3 ways), 8 (8 ways), S (speed), gun (laser), T (twin lasers), B (Back fire), flame (Fire ball) and infinite (send you back to the beginning of the stage). You can carry up to 3 weapons (items) and they can be selected by pressing Start. Get hit and you will lose all of them.
